title: Pumpkin-Coffee Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Pumpkin-Coffee Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/4
cup
strong coffee
1
teaspoon
dark brown sugar
1/2
cup
whole milk
1/4
cup
plus
1
tablespoons
pumpkin puree
1/2
teaspoon
ground cinnamon
1/4
teaspoon
ground cloves
1/4
teaspoon
ground ginger
3
cups
coffee ice cream
(about
6
medium
scoops
)
Garnish:
6
whole coffee beans
(optional)
Directions
Stir brown sugar into coffee to dissolve. Let cool.
Add coffee mixture, milk, pumpkin, cinnamon, cloves, and ginger to the jar of a blender. Add ice cream and pulse until smooth. Divide between serving glasses and garnish with a few coffee beans if desired.
Special equipment
blender
